#How to build this project.

= Introduction =

This page describe how to build ab from apachebenche-standalone. 


= Download source code =

You can get the source code from the svn repository. Please follow the instruction on [http://code.google.com/p/apachebench-standalone/source source] page to check it out. 

For end users, the best way is to download a release source package from our [http://code.google.com/p/apachebench-standalone/downloads/list download] page.

= Depend packages =

This project depends on Apache Portable Runtime library and APR-util library, they must be available in your system before building this project.

== Ubuntu 8.10==
